summary.para: The MANIPULATION_PROCESSOR_MANIPULATIONS enumeration different kinds of manipulation which can be applied on a target object.

remarks.para: Use this enumeration with the property to get and set the kind of manipulation data you want to receive from the interface. You can combine different kinds of manipulations by a bitwise OR.

summary.para: Indicates that no manipulations are performed.
Indicates manipulation by moving the target across the horizontal axis.
Indicates manipulation by moving the target across the vertical axis.
Indicates manipulation by making the target larger or smaller.
Indicates manipulation by rotating the target.
